text: Avoca railway station served the town of Avoca in County Wicklow.The station was known as Ovoca until 1912. It opened on 18 July 1863 and was closed on 30 March 1964 except for special excursions. ==References== Category:Railway stations in County Wicklow Category:Buildings and structures in County Wicklow Category:Railway stations opened in 1863 Category:Railway stations closed in 1964 Category:Disused railway stations in County Wicklow
title: Avoca railway station (Ireland)
